faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: Everything you need to go from concept to fully deployed Al agent-done for you, end to end.
faq.0_question: What kinds of problems can a custom AI agent solve?
faq.0_answer: AI agents can handle everything from answering customer inquiries, managing internal workflows, extracting insights from documents, to automating tasks across apps like Slack, CRMs, and databases. If it's repetitive, time-consuming, or data-driven. An agent can likely help.
faq.1_question: How long does the process take?
faq.1_answer: Most clients go from strategy to launch in 10-14 business days.
faq.2_question: Do I need to know anything about AI?
faq.2_answer: Nope. We handle all the technical work. Just tell us what you want the agent to do.
faq.3_question: What kind of tools can it integrate with?
faq.3_answer: Slack, Notion, Google Workspace, CRMs, Zapier, APIs, internal databases, you name it.
faq.4_question: Can the AI use our internal data?
faq.4_answer: Yes. We use Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to let your agent access and reason over your internal documents, knowledge bases, and systems. Securely and with up-to-date context.
